test_knn_one_dimension.py¶

test_knn_one_dimension.test_method1(show=False)¶
Parameters

show – Boolean of whether or not to plot the results of the process and the original data

Runs k-NN detection with the configuration of {“method_name”: “knn”, “is_univariate”: False, “cut_off”: 0.15}

test_knn_one_dimension.test_method2(show=False)¶
Parameters

show – Boolean of whether or not to plot the results of the process and the original data

Runs k-NN detection with the configuration of {“method_name”: “knn”, “is_univariate”: False, “cut_off”: 0.25}

test_knn_one_dimension.test_method3(show=False)¶
Parameters

show – Boolean of whether or not to plot the results of the process and the original data

Runs k-NN detection with the configuration of {“method_name”: “knn”, “is_univariate”: False, “cut_off”: 0.35}

test_knn_one_dimension.test_method4(show=False)¶
Parameters

show – Boolean of whether or not to plot the results of the process and the original data

Runs k-NN detection with the configuration of {“method_name”: “knn”, “is_univariate”: False, “cut_off”: 0.45}
